# Data Store Record Types

**API Collection**

Explore the constants that identify the types of data that websites store.

## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebsiteDataRecord] object includes these constants in its [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebsiteDataRecord/dataTypes] property.

## Cookie type

- **WKWebsiteDataTypeCookies**: Cookies.

## Cache types

- **WKWebsiteDataTypeMemoryCache**: In-memory caches.
- **WKWebsiteDataTypeDiskCache**: On-disk caches.
- **WKWebsiteDataTypeOfflineWebApplicationCache**: HTML offline web app caches.

## Storage types

- **WKWebsiteDataTypeLocalStorage**: HTML local storage.
- **WKWebsiteDataTypeSessionStorage**: HTML session storage.

## Database types

- **WKWebsiteDataTypeWebSQLDatabases**: WebSQL databases.
- **WKWebsiteDataTypeIndexedDBDatabases**: IndexedDB databases.

## Screen time type

- **WKWebsiteDataTypeScreenTime**

## Getting the Data Type

- **dataTypes**: The types of data associated with the record.

items.description: The types of data associated with the record.
